channel.title: Need help at npc
channel.description: how can i make a npc with my name and i put the armor and stuff? please help

item.title: Need help at npc
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

i can help you go into your client files and go into class5.java and search for the npc id you want or search for the name of it or what i did is somthing like this

if(i == 0)
{
class5.aString65 = “BlacknRaven”;
class5.aByteArray89 = “Teh Owner’s Npc”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 0)-------------------this is the npc id
{
class5.aString65 = “BlacknRaven”;---------------------------this is the name of npcs
class5.aByteArray89 = “Teh Owner’s Npc”.getBytes();-------------------this is the exmaine text
}

Read full topic
